name: Impulse Cover
description: ESPHome component for single-pulse cover control systems
author: ESPHome Community

open_duration.description: Time duration to fully open the cover

close_duration.description: Time duration to fully close the cover

pulse_delay.description: Delay between stop and reverse pulses

safety_timeout.description: Maximum time for any single operation

open_sensor.description: Optional binary sensor for open position detection

close_sensor.description: Optional binary sensor for close position detection
